name: DispatchSourceProcess
desc: A dispatch source that monitors an external process for events.

items.name: var handle: pid_t
items.desc: The process identifier of the process being monitored by the dispatch source.

items.name: var data: DispatchSource.ProcessEvent
items.desc: Data associated with the last process-related event.

items.name: var mask: DispatchSource.ProcessEvent
items.desc: The process events being monitored by the dispatch source.
